item.title: About
item.description: Likes coffee darker than his soul. Confused between Kafka and Kafka. Movies, Anime & Books are his Opium, Morphine & Ecstasy - in that order. Spends his days at Gojek building some streaming pipelines. Ping here to have a chat: twitter: @james_bondu email: arujit1997@gmail.com
